author: Peter Schacknow
title: Stocks making the biggest moves in the premarket: Kraft Heinz, 3M, Slack and more
description: The stocks making the biggest moves in premarket trading include Boeing, Activision, Wells Fargo and more.
content:
Take a look at some of the biggest stocks moving before the market opens:
